page.title: 11My day at School
page.content:
I wake up at seven o'clock and get dressed and have a wash. Then I play until Mummy calls me down for breakfast. I usually have cereal, toast and a cup of tea.
At about half past eight Mummy takes me to school in the car and I go into school and play with my friends. School starts at nine o'clock. After {registration}we have{assembly}then we go back to our classroom to work. First we do{reading}then we have{maths or{English}for the rest of the morning. At lunchtime I have the packed lunch I bring with me and play on the climbing frame.
In the afternoon we work in the school{nature reserve}identifying plants for our{log book}. School finishes at quarter past three.
